name: civicxchain
description: CivicXChain - Environmental Commitment Platform with Blockchain

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run blockchain" "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.deploy: cd civicxchain-platform && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd civicxchain-platform && npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run compile
